description: Unique ID within NEON database; an identifier for the record
NEON site code
Identifier for location where sample was collected
The start date-time or interval during which an event occurred
The end date-time or interval during which an event occurred
Indicates if an event lasts longer than the one month. If Y, a new record for next month is expected
Indicates if the event start and/or end dates are estimated or actual
Technician notes; free text comments to provide additional information about the start and/or end dates
An identifier for the set of information associated with the event, which includes information about the place and time of the event
The NEON document number and version where detailed information regarding the sampling method used is available; format NEON.DOC.######vX
Classification of information associated with the event type
Category information for the method or type choice associated with the event type
Person name or common name associated with an ownership change or chemical application event type
Scientific name, associated with the taxonID. This is the name of the lowest level taxonomic rank that can be determined
entryValidationRulesParser: [ELEMENT_OF( 'PLANT', 'scientificName', 'T')][IF (eventType = 'plantAddition' OR 'plantReduction'), REQUIRE][IF (IS_BLANK(otherScientificName) AND eventType = 'biocontrol'), REQUIRE][IF (IS_BLANK(otherScientificName) AND eventType = 'populationSpike'), REQUIRE]
entryValidationRulesForm: [ELEMENT_OF( 'PLANT', 'scientificName', 'T')][IF (eventType = 'plantAddition' OR 'plantReduction'), REQUIRE][IF (IS_BLANK(otherScientificName) AND eventType = 'biocontrol'), REQUIRE][IF (IS_BLANK(otherScientificName) AND eventType = 'populationSpike'), REQUIRE]

description: Other scientific name, not included in the NEON constrained taxon tables. This is the name of the lowest level taxonomic rank that can be determined
Fire severity classification
Indicates whether or not biomass was removed for plant reduction
The minimum quantity of the event measured
entryValidationRulesParser: [ASCII][IF (eventType = 'grazing' OR 'chemicalApplication' OR 'animalReduction' OR 'tillage' OR 'otherNaturalDisturbance' OR 'wildlifeDisturbance' OR 'humanDisturbance' OR 'pollutant'), REQUIRE]
entryValidationRulesForm: [ASCII][IF (eventType = 'grazing' OR 'chemicalApplication' OR 'animalReduction' OR 'tillage' OR 'wildlifeDisturbance' OR 'humanDisturbance' OR 'pollutant'), REQUIRE]

description: The maximum quantity of the event measured
entryValidationRulesParser: [ASCII][IF (eventType = 'grazing' OR 'chemicalApplication' OR 'animalReduction' OR 'tillage' OR 'otherNaturalDisturbance' OR 'wildlifeDisturbance' OR 'humanDisturbance' OR 'pollutant'), REQUIRE]
entryValidationRulesForm: [ASCII][IF (eventType = 'grazing' OR 'chemicalApplication' OR 'animalReduction' OR 'tillage' OR 'wildlifeDisturbance' OR 'humanDisturbance' OR 'pollutant'), REQUIRE]

description: The unit that corresponds to the quantity measurement
Indicates source of observation reporting; 'primary' for NEON team member observed and 'secondary' for non-NEON individuals observed
Technician notes; free text comments accompanying the record
An identifier for the technician who recorded the data
Version of the Fulcrum application used during data entry
Operating System and browser information (where applicable) of computer used during data entry
Data quality flag
